name: Gasmasks
description:
You woke up. Its been years since you went to sleep. You wonder what has changed. Turns out, its more than you expected.

Gasmasks is a top down shooter game where you play as Charles, as he tries to escape the lab. You need to collect Batteries to power up an elevator to take you back to the surface. The game has been a large project for me to work on, and it has been very fun! 

CONTROLS:
WASD: Movement
E: Item usage
SPACE: Interacting with objects and the elevator
Left click: Normal Fire
Right click: Scatter shot (Does less damage)

Thank you!

PS: there is a glitch where the game will be small and u will not be able to click anything. If this happens, restart the game
